message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8200 for it. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
